mapper.sql: PUID, P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID, P_CFG0_DESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID, P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID, P_H9FEATURENAME, P_H9FEATUREENNAME, P_H9FEATUREDESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC
mapper.select:
select
from HZ_CFG0_RECORD t where t.p_cfg0_main_item_puid=( select t2.puid from Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t2 where t2.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=#{projectPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_CFG0_RECORD (PUID, P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID, P_CFG0_DESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME, P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID, P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID, P_H9FEATURENAME, P_H9FEATUREENNAME, P_H9FEATUREDESC, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC) values (#{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0ObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pH9featurename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pH9featureenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pH9featuredesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HZ_CFG0_RECORD set P_CFG0_OBJECT_ID = #{pCfg0ObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_DESC = #{pCfg0Desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_FAMILY_NAME = #{pCfg0FamilyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_FAMILY_PUID = #{pCfg0FamilyPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID = #{pCfg0MainItemPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_H9FEATURENAME = #{pH9featurename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_H9FEATUREENNAME = #{pH9featureenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_H9FEATUREDESC = #{pH9featuredesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CFG0_FAMILY_DESC = #{pCfg0FamilyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
